div.head: 小便反利
div.div: minor relief contrary [to the nature of the disease] unimpeded; free flow of urine despite [the nature of the disease]

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: minor relief contrary [to the nature of the disease] unimpeded; free flow of urine despite [the nature of the disease]

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with xiao bian zi li 小便自利 , spontaneous free flow of urine. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry feng mi 蜂蜜 quoting Shang han lun 傷寒論 233: 小便自利 , “Free flow of urine”, writes: 小便反利 , “ Free flow of urine despite [the nature of the disease] .
